mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO qh_video (user_id, uuid, video_cover, video_desc, channel_id, video_title, video_duration, video_content, bit_rate, like_times, play_times, comment_times, share_times, store_times, video_width, video_height, video_file_size, video_codec_name, video_codec_type, video_status, display_aspect_ratio, upload_time)
VALUES (#{userId}, #{uuid}, #{videoCover}, #{desc}, #{channel}, #{title}, #{duration}, #{videoContent}, #{bitRate}, #{likeTimes}, #{playTimes}, #{commentTimes}, #{shareTimes}, #{storeTimes}, #{width}, #{height}, #{fileSize}, #{codecName}, #{codecType}, #{status}, #{displayAspectRatio}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, uuid, video_cover, video_desc, video_title, video_duration, video_content, like_times, play_times, comment_times, share_times, store_times, upload_time, bit_rate, video_status FROM qh_video v JOIN qh_user_like_video qulv ON v.video_id=qulv.video_id AND qulv.user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY qulv.like_time desc
mapper.update: UPDATE qh_video SET play_times = play_times + 1 WHERE video_id=#{videoId}
UPDATE qh_video SET like_times = like_times + 1 WHERE video_id=#{videoId}
UPDATE qh_video SET like_times = like_times - 1 WHERE video_id=#{videoId}
UPDATE qh_video SET comment_times = comment_times + 1 WHERE video_id=#{videoId}
